name: The Pigeon Aviation School of Cyprus
about: The Pigeon Aviation School of Cyprus, based at Larnaca International Airport, has been providing excellence in flight training since 2019. As a privately owned flight school, we offer flexible and personalized training solutions for both licensed and non-licensed individuals. Our fleet consists of modern Italian-built Tecnam aircraft, and our geographical location ensures ideal year-round weather conditions with over 300 days of sunshine. We provide solo-hire options for licensed pilots and discounted hour-building packages for those pursuing commercial certification. Our professionally qualified instructors are dedicated to meeting your flight training needs, ensuring you receive the best possible education. Join us for a comprehensive and supportive learning environment.
services:
["PRIVATE PILOTS LICENCE
NIGHT RATING QUALIFICATION
PRIVATE HIRE
GROUND TRAINING
MULTI-ENGINE RATING (MEP)"]
